author: woonsan
msg: Fixing a testcase: TestPortalSite always fails on a non-English system because it assumes that the default locale is English on the test machine. For example, `assertEquals("Back to", backMenu.getTitle());' always fails because backMenu.getTitle() is equivalent to backMenu.getTitle(Locale.getDefault()). (The default locale is ko_KR in my case.)
There are too many codes assuming English locale, but keeping these as before seems better to read.
Therefore, I added default locale setting code before testing for non-English testing environments.
